column1: # Description: Table defining additional information on data sources

column6: Name of source, e.g. International Comprehensive Ocean Atmosphere Data Set, RS92 GRUAN Data Product
Abbreviations / product code, e.g. ICOADS, RS92-GDP
Version number for dataset, e.g. Release 3.0.0
Citation to use when using this product
Status of product, draft, pre-release, release
Data centre from which data sourced
Name of PI responsible for dataset
Fields to which following values apply
